name: Shadows Over Waterdeep
setting: The bustling city of Waterdeep in the Forgotten Realms, a cosmopolitan metropolis where intrigue, magic, and adventure converge. The city is divided into wards, each with its own character, from the wealthy Sea Ward to the dangerous Dock Ward.
tone: Urban intrigue with elements of mystery and political maneuvering. Moderate danger with occasional dark undertones.

factions.name: The Harpers
factions.description: A secret network of spellcasters and spies who advocate for equality and covertly oppose the abuse of power. They work in the shadows to keep power out of the hands of the unworthy.

factions.name: The Zhentarim
factions.description: A shadowy network of mercenaries and merchants seeking to expand their influence through legitimate and illicit means. They value power and profit above all.

factions.name: The Lords' Alliance
factions.description: A coalition of rulers from cities across Faerûn who believe in mutual defense and prosperity. They seek to maintain the political balance in Waterdeep.

majorArcs: The mysterious disappearance of nobles from the Sea Ward
Rising tensions between the city's merchant guilds
Strange magical disturbances in the Undermountain
A prophecy about an ancient artifact hidden beneath the city
lore: Waterdeep, also known as the City of Splendors, has stood for over a thousand years as a beacon of civilization in the North. Founded by pirates and rogues, it has grown into one of the most influential cities in Faerûn. The city is ruled by a council of masked Lords, with only the Open Lord's identity publicly known. Beneath the city lies Undermountain, a vast dungeon carved by the mad wizard Halaster Blackcloak.
campaignRules: Resurrection magic is rare and costly
